com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
Class SmartCommands.ProgressDialogGuardedCommmand

java.lang.Object
  com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.GuardedCommand
      com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommmand
          com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.ProgressDialogGuardedCommmand
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
SmartCommands
public abstract static class SmartCommands.ProgressDialogGuardedCommmand
extends SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommmand

A handy SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommmand which will issue systematically dismiss a ProgressDialog once the command execution is over.

This kind of command is especially useful when a ProgressDialog is being displayed just before the current command execution, and that it should be dismissed at the end of its execution.

Since:
2011.11.03

SmartCommands.ProgressDialogGuardedCommmand

Same as SmartCommands.ProgressDialogGuardedCommmand#ProgressDialogGuardedCommmand(Context, String, String, ProgressDialog) with the third parameter equal to context.getString(warningDisplayMessageResourceId).

SmartCommands.ProgressDialogGuardedCommmand

public SmartCommands.ProgressDialogGuardedCommmand(android.content.Context context,
                                                   java.lang.String warningLogMessage,
                                                   java.lang.String warningDisplayMessage,
                                                   android.app.ProgressDialog progressDialog)
Creates a new SmartCommands.GuardedCommand, which will issue a warning log and then trigger a SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommmand, if an exception occurs during its execution, and eventually dismiss the provided dialog.

Parameters:
context - the Android context under which the commands is being run
warningLogMessage - the log message that will be output in case of exception
warningDisplayMessage - the (supposedly i18ned) human readable that will be transfered to the SmartCommands.GuardedException in case of exception during the command execution
progressDialog - the dialog to be dismissed at the end of the command execution ; may be null, and in that case, just behaves as its parent SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommmand
See Also:
SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommmand#SimpleGuardedCommmand(Context, String, String)
Method Detail

runGuardedDialog

protected abstract void runGuardedDialog()
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
The actual command method to implement.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if something wrong happened during the command execution

runGuarded

protected final void runGuarded()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
The implementation will invoke the runGuardedDialog() method, and will eventually dismiss the progressDialog if necessary, whatever happens.

Specified by:
runGuarded in class SmartCommands.GuardedCommand
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - the method allows an exception to be thrown, and will be appropriately caught by the ActivityController#handleException(Activity, Throwable) method
See Also:
SmartCommands.GuardedCommand.runGuarded()
